item.description:
Detailed Information for the 2008 Art & Photo Days on Thacher Island has just been released!


Artist Work Day Information



Where to meet: T-Wharf by the Sandy Bay Yacht Club, Rockport
Event location: Thacher Island, Rockport
When: August 2, 2008 (August 9 Rain Date)
Launch Departure from T-Wharf: 9a.m. Be sure to arrive 20 minutes before departure!
Launch Return to T-Wharf: 2p.m.
Cost: $25 donation to the Thacher Island Association (must be paid in advance!)

Each CAPE Group member who plans to participate at the August 2nd artist work day needs to RSVP as soon as possible. A $25 donation payable to the Thacher Island Association is required, and must be paid in advance. Reservations on the launch can't be held without the donation! Please understand that the launch holds a maximum of 15 passengers so we need to reserve quickly!

Reservation and Donation Information

Because we plan to attend as a group I will collect member names and the donations. However, the Association will not reserve a launch for our group without payment so I must have your RSVP and payment in order to secure you a space on the 9am launch.

Donations can be sent via Paypal, or you may e-mail me asap for a mailing address. (checks should be made out to the Thacher Island Association)

**Please note**: Donations to the Thacher Island Association are NOT refundable.


What to Bring

  • Photography Equipment
  • Hat and Sunscreen
  • Lunch (drinks will be available)
  • Jacket




Information on the Art & Photo Show


The Art & Photo Show opens August 21 and will be held in Rockport at the Haskins Building on Main Street (former Madras Shop / soon to be the new Rockport Chamber Music Festival concert hall.) There is no additional entrance fee to participate in the show for those who pay to go to the island. Members of the group who do not go to the island for one of the artist work days are welcome to enter work to exhibit in the show, but each would then need to make a $25 donation to enter.

All are welcome to come enjoy the show, whether they participate in it or not. There is an opening reception to kick off the show on Thursday August 21 from 6 - 9 pm. It is open to everyone. Work will remain on display and be for sale through Sunday August 24.
item.name: Special Event: Art & Photo Day on Thacher Island
